Summary: It looked like a white comet with a compact tail flying very slowly across the sky!
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been no other sightings in Barry
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI just looked out of my window and in the sky i saw what i can only describe as a small looking white comet, it had a very small and compact tail and the white light it was emitting would fade until it was gone and then it would just light up again?,all whilst travelling across the sky in the 10 mins that i observed it,i call it a comet because i cant think what else to call it and it did resemble one, it slowly crossed the sky until the shape of it resembled a disk shape,but i think this was because of the angle i was looking from,can't be sure, but within a few more seconds i couldn't see it anymore. I saw this "comet" at 6.00pm BST in Barry,s.wales,UK, and it went in the direction of the west! My camera is not so good so i couldn't take a picture or film it unfortunately!
